      • getAddress

        protected static java.lang.String getAddress(java.lang.String publicKey,
                                             Hash hashInterface)
        calculate the address according to the given public key
        参数:
        publicKey - the Hexed publicKey that need to calculate address
        hashInterface - the hash implement, support SM3Hash and Keccak256 now
        返回:
        the account address
